import {Fragment, useContext} from "react" import {Link, Outlet} from "react-router-dom" import { UserContext } from "../contexts/userContext" const Navigation = () => { const {currentUser} = useContext(UserContext) console.log(currentUser) return (
Home
Signup
About
{ currentUser ? (Sign Out) :
Signin
}
) } export default Navigation
